# Style By Bec - SolidJS Beauty Consultant Website

This project is a beauty consultant website built with SolidJS and Tailwind CSS for Bec, featuring:
- Navigation with About, Services, Pricing, Contact sections
- Pricing at $150/hr with bundle sessions and monthly subscriptions
- Contact form sending emails to stylebybec@gmail.com

## Development Guidelines
- Use SolidJS for components and reactivity
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Follow responsive design principles
- Maintain clean, semantic HTML structure
